name: Rosa The Sea Otter: The Game (Birthday Edition)
name_original: Rosa The Sea Otter: The Game (Birthday Edition)
description:
Oh no! It looks like The Bell Pepper been driven mad! And it looks like Rosa is the only one who stop him.

Defeat The Brainwashed Bell Pepper before it's too late!

------------------------------------

-Arrow keys to move (up is jump this time)

-Duck by pressing down

-Roll by moving left/right while ducking

(rolling has a short cooldown

)

-Space to throw rock

------------------------------------

This game was made for Rosa the Sea Otter's 23 birthday! Happy birthday Rosa! Donate to the Monterey Bay Aquarium here to make sure Rosa gets lots of shrimp.
